name: Shell
description: Clam Island is a Gamified Yieldfarming and NFTs Platform with a 3D Island UI that guides the user with characters through the whole yieldfarming-investment process. It has a two-token ($SHELL and $GEM) and two-NFT (Clam and Pearl NFTs) ecosystem. $SHELL is the governance token of Clam Island. The only way in which its supply increases is by burning Clam NFTs.
